name: Dice, Hands & Dragons
description:
This is just a prototype of the card playing along with the combat portion of it. I'm still working on understanding coroutines so it's a bit quick but the game is playable!

Please let me know what you think of the main gameplay loop!

This prototype covers the card and dice portion of the game idea that I have. If it is well received I want to add the following:
*Dice rolling and card playing animations
*Player and enemy character sprites
*Dungeon crawling roguelike/roguelite larger gameplay loop
*Character creator where you pick your stats after rolling dice and  your class to get  different buffs and debuffs to your stats
*Stores to buy upgrades for your runs along with purchasing ways to get rid of cards you don't want
*And more!
